summary:
Stanford University is a top private research university in California, founded in 1885 by Leland Stanford. It started with a mission to honor their late son. The university has faced challenges, including financial struggles and earthquakes, but it thrived after World War II under Frederick Terman's leadership. 

Stanford is known for its entrepreneurial spirit, successful start-ups, and innovative research. It has a large campus, offers various sports, and has produced many notable alumni, including world leaders, Nobel Prize winners, and Olympic medalists. The university is also linked to numerous billionaires and prestigious scholars.
title: Stanford University
